com.mixer.interactive.resources.control

Class JoystickControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mixer.interactive.resources.InteractiveResource<T>
      • com.mixer.interactive.resources.control.InteractiveControl<JoystickControl>
        • com.mixer.interactive.resources.control.JoystickControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInteractiveCreatable<JoystickControl>, IInteractiveDeletable, IInteractiveUpdatable<JoystickControl>, Comparable<InteractiveControl>

    public class JoystickControl
extends InteractiveControl<JoystickControl>
    A InteractiveControl represents a joystick control on the Interactive service.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Microsoft Corporation
